q: I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office.

Colin Powell said this partnership is based on solid foundations of cooperation in politics, economics, and security and should be strongly encouraged. Kanat Saudabayev briefed Colin Powell on the outcome of Kazakhstan's OSCE chairmanship and the decisions of the Astana summit, the ministry reported. The meeting with Former National Security Adviser Brent Scowcroft discussed the current state and prospects of the nuclear nonproliferation regime, as well as development of nuclear power in the world. The show also boosted careers of comics including Billy Crystal , Arsenio Hall and David Letterman . Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business, Billy Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists.''
